verses.text_plain: Lord, thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.
verses.verse_html:
1Lord, thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob. ▼
▼ for the sons: or, of the sons
 , ▼
▼ favourable: or, well pleased

footnotes.body_text: ▼ for the sons: or, of the sons
footnotes.body_html: ▼ for the sons: or, of the sons
▼ favourable: or, well pleased

verses.text_plain: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered all their sin. Selah.
verses.verse_html: 2Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered all their sin. Selah.

verses.text_plain: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.
verses.verse_html:
3Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger. ▼
▼ thyself…: or, thine anger from waxing hot

footnotes.body_text: ▼ thyself…: or, thine anger from waxing hot
footnotes.body_html: ▼ thyself…: or, thine anger from waxing hot

verses.text_plain: Turn us, O God of our salvation, and cause thine anger toward us to cease.
verses.verse_html: 4Turn us, O God of our salvation, and cause thine anger toward us to cease.

verses.text_plain: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?
verses.verse_html: 5Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?

verses.text_plain: Wilt thou not revive us again: that thy people may rejoice in thee?
verses.verse_html: 6Wilt thou not revive us again: that thy people may rejoice in thee?

verses.text_plain: Shew us thy mercy, O Lord, and grant us thy salvation.
verses.verse_html: 7Shew us thy mercy, O Lord, and grant us thy salvation.

verses.text_plain: I will hear what God the Lord will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.
verses.verse_html: 8I will hear what God the Lord will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.

tokens.text: but let them not turn again

verses.text_plain: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land.
verses.verse_html: 9Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land.

verses.text_plain: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
verses.verse_html: 10Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

verses.text_plain: Truth shall spring out of the earth; and righteousness shall look down from heaven.
verses.verse_html: 11Truth shall spring out of the earth; and righteousness shall look down from heaven.

verses.text_plain: Yea, the Lord shall give that which is good; and our land shall yield her increase.
verses.verse_html: 12Yea, the Lord shall give that which is good; and our land shall yield her increase.

verses.text_plain: Righteousness shall go before him; and shall set us in the way of his steps.
verses.verse_html: 13Righteousness shall go before him; and shall set us in the way of his steps.
